body:
@broady, the same files are in Go 1.6:

```
go/misc/tour/src/
go/misc/tour/src/golang.org/
go/misc/tour/src/golang.org/x/
go/misc/tour/src/golang.org/x/tour/
go/misc/tour/src/golang.org/x/tour/pic/
go/misc/tour/src/golang.org/x/tour/pic/pic.go
go/misc/tour/src/golang.org/x/tour/tree/
go/misc/tour/src/golang.org/x/tour/tree/tree.go
go/misc/tour/src/golang.org/x/tour/wc/
go/misc/tour/src/golang.org/x/tour/wc/wc.go
```

I forgot we shipped the tour in the releases. Is this a bug in cmd/release? Something to fix for Go1.6rc2? (i.e. fix immediately this morning?).
